QAData.question: Who won between Burnley and Chelsea on Sat, 05 Mar 2022 15:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 4–0 over Burnley on Sat, 05 Mar 2022 15:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Aaron Lennon has the least touches (28) of any outfield player.
Thiago Silva is the most accurate passer (96%) in the match.
James Tarkowski made an error that led to a goal for Chelsea.
Antonio Rüdiger completed the most passes (114) in the match.
N'Golo Kanté created the most chances (3) in the match.
Christian Pulisic was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.7.
